      • zeus.moves.LocalMixtureMove

zeus.moves.LocalMixtureMove¶

class zeus.moves.LocalMixtureMove(tune=False, mu0=1.0, n_components=5)¶

The Karamanis & Beutler (2020) “Local Mixture Move” with parallelization.

Parameters

  • tune (bool) – If True then tune this move. Default is True.

  • mu0 (float) – Default value of mu if tune=False.

__init__(tune=False, mu0=1.0, n_components=5)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Methods

__init__([tune, mu0, n_components])

Initialize self.

get_direction(X, mu)

Generate direction vectors.
